title: Rescue the Trapped Man
content: rd, engage in conversation with Benryn, who is either searching for his lover, Mirileth, or grieving her loss, depending on which route was taken for his escape from the fire. If you first encountered him after following the Fist into the burning building and lead him out the front entrance, he will search be searching for her and ask for help finding her.
